about.summary: Extended pickling support for Python objects

name: cloudpickle
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.2.2" %}

package:
  name: cloudpickle
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: cloudpickle-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/c/cloudpickle/cloudpickle-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9da26af07a25431d8a3c412d4c8e78823c1298655d354f4f570ece1b995f8e74

build:
  number: 2
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - cloudpickle

about:
  home: https://github.com/cloudpipe/cloudpickle
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  summary: Extended pickling support for Python objects

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham
    - ogrisel
    - rgbkrk
    - mrocklin
